sources.title: Shaker Run
sources.description: A New Zealand government scientist hires a stunt-driving team to transport a lethal virus and keep it out of the hands of her own country's military.

metadata.Plot: With the accidental discovery of a lethal bio-agent at her research facility, Dr. Christine Ruben decides to double cross her own government by stealing the deadly formula to keep it out of the clutches of the military, whom she doesn't trust. To make her rendezvous with some confederates who promise to get her out of the country, she recruits daredevil driver Judd Pierson and his partner Casey Lee, who are down on their luck and take the job without knowing what they're getting into.
metadata.Writer: Jim Kouf, Henry Fownes, Bruce Morrison
metadata.Actors: Cliff Robertson, Leif Garrett, Lisa Harrow
